column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What was nice was the food and beverages. Both were really quite good. We also took the time to get the paella to split with the table
column2: which was well worth the wait. They had a great selection of adult beverages to make anyone happy. The desserts Â were adorable! I say that because we got two sampler orders and split them
column3: which was the right size and the right flavors. It's a very well-considered menu on the whole.
